name: Vander Decken IX
text: On Play: You may trash a <Fishman> type card from your hand or trash a "Noa's Ark" from your hand or field. K.O. up to one of your opponent's rested characters.

effect.text: You may trash a <Fishman> type card from your hand or trash a "Noa's Ark" from your hand or field. K.O. up to one of your opponent's rested characters.
